description: Tuck into a warm golden cobbler with a gooey centre chock-full of blueberries and melted white chocolate chunks. Try this easy dessert recipe today.
name: Blueberry & White Chocolate Cobbler Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 110g solid white chocolate Easter eggs, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Lightly grease a 6-cup capacity ovenproof dish.
Reserve 1/3 cup blueberries. Place remaining blueberries, vanilla and zest and lemon juice in dish and stir to combine.

Place cake mix, butter and milk in a large bowl. Using a wooden spoon, stir to combine. Spoon batter over blueberry mixture in dish. Scatter over reserved blueberries and chocolate eggs. Bake for 45 minutes or until cake is golden and firm to touch. Serve.
